page.title: 17RECREATION IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {MERLEY BIRD GDNS.}are owned by Mr Mar- tin & open to the public,they occupy 5acres of the grounds of Merley House, (4 are the old walled garden).Ten people are employed.There are 80 diff- erent species of bird from all over the world.There is an old English herb garden with 40 varieties,a cafeteria & a restaurant which can be hired for private functions.On Tues.& Thursdays in July & August folk evenings are or- ganised.There is also a boarding catt- ery & gift & pet shop{WALKING}is popu- lar in the area.There is a{GOLF CLUB which covers 250 acres & has 800 mem- bers & a{CRICKET CLUB}in Broadstone. {FLIGHT REFUELLING,}a Wimborne based Co has their sports ground near Merley PO Although it is a private club,their facilities are loaned to the local community.The pupils from Canford School row & canoe on the{RIVER STOUR.
